topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556e46af6368723f5de30000#post_556e46af6368723f5de30000
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556e462d6368723bd96c0400#post_556e462d6368723bd96c0400
You mean hardcore fans?[/bq]
Pretty much.

For some reason a lot of people have this mentality that you have to be a hardcore fan in order to like something, but it's totally possible to just be a casual fan of something.  Like I'm a casual fan of doctor who; I like the show and all, but I don't really do anything with the fandom; I just hang out and like cool artwork.
